Verses: 1 aadhaam, Sedh, Enos,
2 kenaan, Magalaaleyel, Yaaredh,
3 enokku, Meththoosalaa, Laamekku,
4 novaa, Sem, Kaam, Yaappedh.
5 yaappeththin Kumaarar, Komar, Maagogu, Maadhaai, Yaavaan, Thoobaal, Mesekku, Theeraas Enbavargal.
6 komarin Kumaarar, Askinaas, Reeppaaththu, Thogarmaa Enbavargal.
7 yaavaanin Kumaarar, Elisaa, Tharshees, Kiththeem, Thodhaaneem Enbavargal.
8 kaamin Kumaarar, Koosh, Misraayeem, Poodh, Kaanaan Enbavargal.
9 kooshin Kumaarar, Sebaa, Aavilaa, Sapthaa, Raamaa, Sapthigaa Enbavargal; Raamaavin Kumaarar, Sebaa, Thidhaan Enbavargal.
10 koosh Nimrodhaip Petraan; Ivan Boomiyile Paraakkiramasaaliyaanaan.
11 misraayeem Loodheemiyaraiyum, Aanaamiyaraiyum, Lekaabiyaraiyum, Napthoogiyaraiyum,
12 padhroosiyaraiyum, Pelistharaip Petra Kasloogiyaraiyum, Kapthoriyaraiyum Petraan.
13 kaanaan Than Mooththamaganaagiya Seedhonaiyum, Keththaiyum,
14 epoosiyaraiyum, Emoriyaraiyum, Kirkaasiyaraiyum,
15 eviyaraiyum, Arkeeyaraiyum, Seeniyaraiyum,
16 arvaadhiyaraiyum, Semaariyaraiyum, Kaamaaththiyaraiyum Petraan.
17 semin Kumaarar, Elaam, Asoor, Arpaksaadh, Loodh, Aaraam, Oodhs, Kool, Kethther, Mesak Enbavargal.
18 arpaksaadh Saalaavaip Petraan; Saalaa Eperaip Petraan.
19 eperukku Irandu Kumaarar Pirandhaargal; Oruvan Per Pelegu, Enenil Avan Naatkalil Boomi Pagukkappattadhu; Avan Sagodharan Per Yokdhaan.
20 yokdhaan Almodhaadhaiyum, Saaleppaiyum, Aasarmaaveththaiyum, Yeraagaiyum,
21 adhoraamaiyum, Oosaalaiyum, Thiklaavaiyum,
22 obaalaiyum, Abimaavelaiyum, Sebaavaiyum,
23 oppeeraiyum, Aavilaavaiyum, Yobaabaiyum Petraan; Ivargal Ellaarum Yokdhaanin Kumaarar.
24 sem, Arpaksaadh, Saalaa,
25 eper, Pelegu, Rekoo,
26 seroogu, Naagor, Theraagu,
27 aabiraamaagiya Aabiragaam,
28 aabiragaamin Kumaarar, Eesaakku, Ismavel Enbavargal.
29 ivargaludaiya Sandhadhigalaavana: Ismavelin Mooththa Kumaaranaagiya Nebaayodh, Kedhaar, Adhpiyel, Mipsaam,
30 mishmaa, Thoomaa, Maasaa, Aadhaadh, Themaa,
31 yeththoor, Naapees, Kedhmaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Ismavelin Kumaarar.
32 aabiragaamin Marumanaiyaattiyaagiya Keththooraal Petra Kumaarar, Simraan, Yakshaan, Medhaan, Meedhiyaan, Ispaag, Soovaa Enbavargal; Yakshaanin Kumaarar, Sebaa, Thedhaan Enbavargal.
33 meedhiyaanin Kumaarar, Eppaa, Epper, Aanokku, Apeedhaa, Eldhaagaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Ellaarum Keththuraalin Kumaarar.
34 aabiragaam Eesaakkaip Petraan; Eesaakkin Kumaarar, Esaa Isravel Enbavargal.
35 esaavin Kumaarar, Eleeppaas, Reguvel, Eyoosh, Yaalaam, Koraagu Enbavargal.
36 elippaasin Kumaarar, Themaan, Omaar, Seppi, Kaththaam, Kenaas, Thimnaa, Amalekku Enbavargal.
37 reguvelin Kumaarar, Nagaadh, Seraagu, Sammaa, Meesaa Enbavargal.
38 seyeerin Kumaarar, Loththaan, Sobaal, Sibiyon, Aanaa, Theeson, Edhser, Theesaan Enbavargal.
39 loththaanin Kumaarar, Ori, Omaam Enbavargal; Loththaanin Sagodhari Thimnaal Enbavargal.
40 sobaalin Kumaarar, Alvaan, Maanagaadh, Ebaal, Seppo, Onaam Enbavargal; Sibiyonin Kumaarar, Ayaa, Aanaagu Enbavargal.
41 aanaagin Kumaararil Oruvan Thishon Enbavan; Thishonin Kumaarar, Amraam, Espaan Iththaraan, Keraan Enbavargal.
42 edhserin Kumaarar, Pilkaan, Sagavaan, Yaakkaan Enbavargal; Thishaanin Kumaarar, Oodhs, Araan Enbavargal.
43 isravel Puththirarai Oru Raajaa Aalaadhadharku Munne, Edhom Dhesaththil Arasaanda Raajaakkalaanavargal: Peyorin Kumaaran Pelaa Enbavan; Ivan Pattanaththin Per Thinkaabaa.
44 pelaa Mariththapin Posraa Ooraanaagiya Seraagin Kumaaran Yobaab Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
45 yobaab Mariththapin, Themaaniyarin Dhesaththaanaagiya Oosaam Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
46 oosaam Mariththapin, Pedhaadhin Kumaaran Aadhaadh Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan, Ivan Meedhiyaaniyarai Movaabin Naattile Muriya Adiththavan; Ivan Pattanaththinper Aaveedh.
47 aadhaadh Mariththapin, Masrekkaa Ooraanaagiya Samlaa Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
48 samlaa Mariththapin, Nadhiyoramaana Regopoththaanaagiya Savul Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
49 savul Mariththapin, Akporin Kumaaran Paagaalaanaan Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
50 paagaalaanaan Mariththapin, Aadhaadh Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan; Ivan Pattanaththinper Paagi; Mesakaabin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Maaththireththin Magalaana Avan Manaiviyin Per Megedhabel.
51 aadhaadh Mariththapin, Edhomil Erpatta Prabukkalaanavargal; Thimnaa Prabu, Alyaa Prabu, Edhedh Prabu,
52 akolibaamaa Prabu, Elaa Prabu, Pinon Prabu,
53 kenaas Prabu, Themaan Prabu, Mipsaar Prabu,
54 makdhiyel Prabu, Eeraam Prabu, Ivargale Edhomin Prabukkal.
